name: Blackwood Park [Erweiterung]
atmosphere: An old, poorly-maintained park. The trees are ancient and gnarled, and the paths are often shrouded in mist from the river. It is unnaturally quiet.
details: A crumbling stone fountain, its water black and stagnant.
A wrought-iron gazebo, covered in rust and strange, thorny vines.
A statue of a forgotten Arkham founder, its face eroded into a screaming mask.
clues: A known meeting place for clandestine lovers and secret societies. Several people have gone missing here over the years.
